sense.gloss: to go in the direction of, to proceed toward, to proceed according to, to repair to, to betake oneself to
to become, to face (facts, circumstances, etc.)
to abide by, to agree to, to consent to, to obey

sdata.j: ↑決心↑↓けっしん↓がつきかねたので、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑感情↑↓かんじょう↓の|おもむく|ままに↑行動↑↓こうどう↓した。
sdata.e: I couldn't decide what to do, so I just followed my heart.

sdata.j: ↑戦場↑↓せんじょう↓に↑赴↑↓|おもむ↓く|カメラマンが↑不発↑↓ふはつ↓↑弾↑↓だん↓の↑危険↑↓きけん↓↑性↑↓せい↓を↑知↑↓し↓らないのは↑不思議↑↓ふしぎ↓だ、↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓↑社↑↓しゃ↓は↑教育↑↓きょういく↓を↑怠↑↓おこた↓ってる。
sdata.e: It is strange that a cameraman heading for a war-zone should not know about the danger of unexploded shells. The newspaper company is being negligent in its training.
